alert.note: Alert for Brazoria Islands; Coastal Brazoria; Galveston Island; Inland Brazoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 11:44AM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN GALVESTON AND SOUTHEASTERN BRAZORIA COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM CST... At 1143 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oyster Creek, or over Clute, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Galveston Island West End, Lake Jackson, Angleton, Freeport, Clute, Surfside Beach, Richwood, Jones Creek, Danbury, Oyster Creek, and San Luis Pass. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Brazoria Islands; Coastal Brazoria; Galveston Island; Inland Brazoria
